title: The 401(k) Explained
description: Learn The 401(k) Explained in one minute.

hook.text: The 401(k) was an accident. A tax code loophole from 1978 became America's primary retirement system.

buildup.text: A 401(k) lets you save pre-tax dollars from your paycheck. The money grows tax-deferred until withdrawal.

twist.text: The 401(k) was never designed to replace pensions. Its inventor later said it was inadequate as a sole plan.

punchline.text: An accidental system. Still your best tool.
